MxDC Documentation¶

About MxDC¶

MxDC (Macromolecular Crystallography Data Collector) is a software package for acquisition of Macromolecular Crystallography data and related techniques at synchrotron beamlines. MxDC has been developed since 2006 and has been the primary software for data acquisition and experiment control at the Canadian Light Source, Macromolecular Crystallography beamlines. It is also used at the Pohang Light Source in South-Korea.

MxDC is developed in the Python Programming Language, and makes use of GTK Toolkit library and the Twisted Network Programming framework.
